Docs.summary: Represents a combo box that is used in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following illustration shows examples of RibbonComboBox controls that have images and labels, that just have images, and that just have labels.
![Ribbon combo box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "Ribbon combo box controls") Ribbon combo box controls
The following illustration shows a RibbonComboBox when the drop-down is opened.
![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open
## Examples The following example shows the markup to create a combo box with three available items.
[!code-xml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonComboBox](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ribboncontrolssample/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncombobox)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void ClearContainerForItemOverride (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ClearContainerForItemOverride(class System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item) cil managed

Docs.param: The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
Docs.summary: Unloads the container for the specified item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the content of the combo box can be edited.
Docs.value: if the content of the combo box can be edited; otherwise, . The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## Examples The following example shows the markup to create a combo box with three available items. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsEditableProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection-only mode is enabled, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.
Docs.value: if the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable; if the contents of the combo box are not selectable and not editable. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnApplyTemplate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`. This implementation does not call the base implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void PrepareContainerForItemOverride (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PrepareContainerForItemOverride(class System.Windows.DependencyObject element, object item) cil managed

Docs.param: The element that is used to display the item.
The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
Docs.summary: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
Gets the item that is displayed in the selection box.
Docs.value: The item that is displayed in the selection box. The registered default is an <xref:System.String.Empty> string. For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionBoxItemProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A> dependency property.
Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
Docs.value: A composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionBoxItemStringFormatProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItemStringFormat%2A> dependency property.
Gets the item template of the selection box content.
Docs.value: The item template of the selection box content. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionBoxItemTemplateProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A>.
Docs.value: A custom object that provides logic and returns a . The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionBoxItemTemplateSelectorProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplateSelector%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box.
Docs.value: The width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box. The registered default is 0.0. For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SelectionBoxWidth property does not include the widths of the image and label that are associated with the combo box. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## Examples The following example shows the markup to create a combo box with three available items. [!code-xml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonComboBox](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ribboncontrolssample/mainwindow.xaml#ribboncombobox)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SelectionBoxWidthProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxWidth%2A> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether to show the keyboard focus visual for this control.
Docs.value: to show the keyboard focus visual; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty ShowKeyboardCuesProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ShowKeyboardCues%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a combo box that is open and displays a drop-down control will remain open when a user clicks the selection box.
Docs.value: to keep the drop-down control open when the user clicks the text area to start editing; otherwise, . The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty StaysOpenOnEditProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.
Docs.value: The text of the item that is displayed in the selection box. The registered default is an <xref:System.String> string. For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks When there is no and is `true`, this property represents the text entered in the text box. When is `false`, this property represents the string version of the selected item. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty TextProperty

Docs.summary: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text%2A> dependency property.
